members.name: Squirrel Goddammit
members.bio: The voice of the void. Screaming truths that the acorn-hoarding elite don't want you to hear.

members.name: Blind Squirrel
members.bio: Even a blind squirrel finds a nut sometimes. This one found distortion and never looked back.

members.name: Anti-Squirrel
members.bio: The backbone of chaos. Hits drums like animal control hits our brothers and sisters.

philosophy.title: DIY OR DIE
philosophy.description: We book our own shows, print our own merch, and answer to no one but Squatan.

philosophy.title: ALL AGES WELCOME
philosophy.description: The pit doesn't check IDs. If you can handle the chaos, you belong here.

philosophy.title: LOUD & PROUD
philosophy.description: We're not turning down. Ever. Bring earplugs or bring regrets.

bio: Born in the dumpsters behind a Central Florida Waffle House, Unholy Rodents emerged from the shadows in 2023 with one mission: to spread the gospel of Squatan through face-melting riffs and throat-shredding vocals.

What started as three squirrels tired of the corporate bird-feeder industrial complex has evolved into a full-blown movement. We're not just a band - we're a warning to anyone who thinks they can cage the wild.
Our sound? Imagine if Slayer got rabies and started a fight with Dead Kennedys in a pet store parking lot. That's us. Fast, loud, and absolutely unhinged.
